entities.description: Represents the type of measurement units used in the dataset (e.g., Gram, Kilogram, Liter).
Specific unit of measurement (e.g., Gram, Kilogram).
The raw count of each measurement type in the dataset.
The percentage of each measurement type in relation to the total number of cases.
The count or percentage of cases with missing data.
The total number of valid cases in the dataset.

relationships.description: Links the specific unit of measurement to its type.
Links each measurement type to its raw count in the dataset.
Links each measurement type to its percentage representation in the dataset.
Indicates the amount of missing data in the dataset.
Indicates the total number of valid cases in the dataset.
